definition: clear and bright/sober and calm/(of a government or administration) well ordered

clear/distinct/quiet/just and honest/pure/to settle or clear up/to clean up or purge

sentences.english: Our hometown's traditional custom is to burn fake money to ancesters and forefathers in Tomb Sweeping Day.
